conversations.conversation:
HI, there my name is Yoly, but all my friends with love call me Kitty, which means a little tender cat, Well yes, they right , I am as softy as a dove, but clever as a snake. you know I have a great sane mind, sane body and sane gold heart. I love to study, to read, to write, To work, To swim, to play tennis, To play the piano, To sing, To help the whole humanity if is possible, I know God has given me lots of talents, gifts and skills and day in a day out, I am concerning how brush up on my skils, I am a professional profesor, I teach many subjects like: English, Informatic, fast reading, mantenience of computers, and so on. I really feel very proud about me, cause I have achieved many goals I have planned to do, beside I have a great humor sense, I Love to smile, even in the most bitter moments, cause it helps me to overcome the problems easily, well at work I am really serious and responsable, I am very organized and discipline, I am as an owl to sleep and as a bird to awake.
;
;IN THIS LITTLE PIECE I WANT YOU TO SHARE SOMETHING ABOUT , WHAT DOES LOVE REALLY MEAN.
;Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud, it is not rude,it is not selfseeking, it is not easily angered, it keeps not record of wrongs. Love does not delight in evil but rejoices with the truth, it always protects, always trust, always hopes, always persevers.
;LOVE NEVER FAILS, and this kind of pure love we only can find in God . WHO WAS ABLE TO SACRIFICE HIS ONLY ONE SON JESUS CHRIST FOR OUR SALVATION.
;GOD SO LOVED THE WORLD, THAT HE GAVE HIS ONLY SON, WORTHY IS THE LAMB. THANKS GOD TO MAKE ME FEEL SO GREAT, YOUR PURE LOVE MAKES ME GRAND
